import React, { Component } from "react"; import "../CSS/donor.css"; import axios from "axios"; export default class ShowDonors extends Component { state = { schemes: [], }; componentDidMount = () => { this.getschemes(); console.log(this.props.location.state.user); }; getschemes = async () => { const token = sessionStorage.getItem("token"); const config = { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}`, "Content-Type": "application/json", }, }; try { const res = await axios.get( ` http://localhost:5000/api/v1/gemploye/scheme/${this.props.location.state.user}`, config ); this.setState({ schemes: res.data.data, }); console.log(res.data.data); } catch (err) { // console.log("Can't load the items"); } }; onDeleteUser = async (user, e) => { e.preventDefault(); // console.log(user); const token = sessionStorage.getItem("token"); const config = { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}`, "Content-Type": "application/json", }, }; try { await axios.delete( `http://localhost:5000/api/v1/gemploye/scheme/${user}`, config ); alert("User Deleted"); } catch (err) { console.log("Can't load the schemes"); } }; render() { return (
